body: @apaszke we need to modify `bernoulli` to support `ByteTensor` before fixing AlphaDropout properly, as currently it's enabled only for [floats and doubles](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/generic/methods/TensorRandom.cwrap#L426), and furthermore it calls the [wrong C function for this use-case](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/generic/methods/TensorRandom.cwrap#L431). Should I put this in a hold while waiting for https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/1747 to be fixed (you self-assigned yourself)?
